content: Wow ... Oxford is going to have a lot of money to spend on #AI: https://www.timeshighereducation.com/news/oxford-receives-ps150-million-gift-study-humanities-and-ai
Major investment in AI by TU Eindhoven (NL): https://eindhovennews.com/news/2019/07/tu-e-invests-100-million-in-ai/
Upon request, we’ll be happy to create streams for national subgroups of CLAIRE, which can be used to coordinate and share information at the national level - for a first example, see CLAIRE/NL.
Please post such requests in # zulip help.

Could you set up a stream for Hungary? Our main fields are (a) human-centered AI (Eötvös University and Semmelweis University), (b) mathematical foundations of AI (Rényi Institute of Mathematics), and applications (Technical University of Budapest and Institute for Computer Science and Control, CEU and specific companies). I will contact them, so they can provide their contributions.
Dear Mr. Lorincz, we have created a public stream CLAIRE/HU. You are already subscibed to this stream.
